settings.text: Handla nu, betala sen med NETS

settings.title: Product Qualites
settings.content:
Flexibility in Focus: We guarantee a comfortable fit with a sense of luxury, without compromising on durability. Our clothes adapt to your movements and keep their shape.

Wrinkle-free Convenience: Forget the iron. Our garments are designed to be wrinkle-free. Wash, hang up, and they're ready to wear again.

Breathability and Quick Drying: Stay cool and fresh all day long. Our fabrics are selected for their breathability and quick-drying properties.

Odour control: Our fabrics are treated to neutralize bacteria that cause body odour. With Duclaire you can feel fresh, even after a long day.

settings.title: Leverans
settings.content:
Sverige: 2 - 5 arbetsdagar (Fri frakt över 1500:-)

Övriga världen: 4-7 arbetsdagar (Fri frakt över 1500:- beroende på region)

Vi erbjuder 30 dagars retur- eller bytesrätt om du av någon anledning inte är nöjd med din beställning. För mer information se vår returpolicy här.

settings.title: THE PERFECT FIT
settings.text: Tailor-made to fit perfectly every time. Countless samples have been remeasured and reconfigured until we finally achieved the ultimate blend of materials for a premium feel and quality. With Duclaire, you can count on an unparalleled fit and comfort, whatever the occasion.

settings.testimonial: Duclaire delivers on its promise of sophistication and elegance. From the luxurious fabrics to the impeccable fit, I feel confident and refined whenever I wear their clothing.
settings.author: Adam

settings.testimonial: As someone who values both style and comfort, Duclaire exceeded my expectations. Their clothing strikes the perfect balance, allowing me to look sharp without sacrificing comfort.
settings.author: Lucas

settings.testimonial: Duclaire's customer service is exceptional. They go above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction, making shopping with them a truly enjoyable experience.
settings.author: Chris

settings.testimonial: I love the versatility of Duclaire's collection. Whether I'm dressing up for a formal event or keeping it casual for a weekend outing, I can always count on their clothing to elevate my look.
settings.author: Nick

settings.testimonial: Impressed by the quality and style of Duclaire's clothing! The attention to detail and craftsmanship is evident in every piece. Definitely my new go-to brand for premium menswear.
settings.author: Peter

settings.testimonial: I've received countless compliments whenever I wear Duclaire. Their clothing not only looks great but also feels incredibly comfortable to wear all day long.
settings.author: Carl

settings.testimonial: Duclaire's attention to detail sets them apart. From the stitching to the fabric selection, every aspect of their clothing exudes quality and refinement.
settings.author: David

settings.title: Don't take our word for it
FOR ALL OCCASIONS
settings.text: Duclaire products are the ultimate clothing for all occasions. You can wear them at home, at work or at the gym. Wherever you are, our garments give you both comfort and style.

settings.title: EXPRESS DELIVERY
settings.text: Experience seamless global shipping with leading carriers such as DHL Express, FedEx, and Postnord, ensuring swift and dependable delivery to your doorstep. Enjoy complimentary shipping on orders exceeding €150 within Europe and €200 worldwide, elevating your shopping experience with every purchase.

settings.title: BUY NOW, PAY LATER
settings.text: Unlock unparalleled flexibility with NETS payments, granting you the freedom to settle your order within 14 days. Try on your pants at your leisure, with the option to decide later if they suit your style.

settings.title: 30 DAYS RETURN
settings.text: Experience worry-free shopping with our hassle-free returns and exchanges. Our 30-day return or exchange policy ensures that if your order doesn't fit or meet your expectations, you can easily return or exchange it without any hassle.

settings.author: Peter
settings.text: Duclaire's clothing is a game-changer! These pants are the best addition to my wardrobe. They fit like a dream and have quickly become my go-to choice. I can't count the number of compliments I've received. Duclaire has truly elevated my style.

settings.author: Liam
settings.text: Duclaire's pants are a must-have! They hug my legs perfectly and make me look and feel incredible. I've received so many compliments, and I can't thank Duclaire enough for helping me step up my fashion game.

settings.author: Adam
settings.text: I'm in love with my Duclaire pants! They're not just pants; they're a fashion statement. The fit is exceptional, and they make me feel confident and stylish. Duclaire has become my fashion secret weapon.
